SEARCH
Package AcademicExchangePlatform.dao

Class CourseApplicationDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
AcademicExchangePlatform.dao.CourseApplicationDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CourseApplicationDAO
public class CourseApplicationDAOImpl extends Object implements CourseApplicationDAO
Implementation of the CourseApplicationDAO interface. Provides methods to create, update, retrieve, and manage course applications.
